page.title: 12WAPLEY COMMON
page.content: A local councillor,one of our school governors,told us that 10 years ago Dodington Parish Council bought{Wapley {Common}so that it could be open to the public to walk dogs,play games,have picnics and enjoy themselves. The{Avon Wildlife Trust}is very interested in the nearby woods(Wapley Bushes) because it has several interesting plants and flowers growing there.They intend setting up a{nature {trail}with notices to show the public where to walk and see the plants. Our school is quite near to the common so,hopefully,we will be able to go out there and use it as a study area for project work.
